review: The idea is nice, but it's simply not powerful enough to do what they are trying to accomplish. I have consistent issues with performance -- HD video will hiccup, stuttering when changing screens, etc. Problem I just don't have with my Chromecast - admittedly they are very different devices, but I prefer it. If you really want a Amazon TV, buy the full Fire TV not just the stick, it just isn't good enough.
